column4: BRIEF-Teladoc To Work With Microsoft To Advance Delivery Of Telehealth
column5: * TELADOC INC - CO  MICROSOFT TO WORK TOGETHER TO ADVANCE DELIVERY OF TELEHEALTH  WITH TELADOC'S PLATFORM RUNNING ON MICROSOFT AZURE CLOUD PLATFORM Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:

column4: Microsoft to buy solar power in Singapore in first renewable deal in Asia
column5: SINGAPORE Microsoft Corp said on Thursday it will buy solar power from the Sunseap Group in Singapore  the technology company's first renewable energy deal in Asia.

column4: Microsoft to buy solar power in Singapore in first renewable deal in Asia
column5: SINGAPORE  March 1 Microsoft Corp said on Thursday it will buy solar power from the Sunseap Group in Singapore  the technology company's first renewable energy deal in Asia.

column4: BRIEF-Microsoft And Sunseap Sign Agreement On Largest-Ever Solar Project In Singapore
